Table of Contents

Class Category

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Models
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Represents a category (folder/group) for organizing subscribed feeds. Supports hierarchical nesting via parent-child relationships and custom sorting. Optimized for fast tree traversal, sorting and filtering in UI components.

[Table("Categories")]
public class Category

Color

Optional accent color for visual differentiation in UI (hex format, e.g., "#FF5733").

[MaxLength(7)]
public string? Color { get; set; }

Property Value

string

CreatedAt

Timestamp when the category was created.

public DateTime CreatedAt { get; set; }

Property Value

DateTime

Depth

Depth level in the category tree (0 = root, 1 = first child, etc.). Computed on demand — useful for indentation in tree views.

[NotMapped]
public int Depth { get; }

Property Value

int

Description

Optional description or notes about the category purpose.

[MaxLength(1000)]
public string? Description { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Feeds

Collection of feeds directly assigned to this category.

public virtual ICollection<Feed> Feeds { get; set; }

Property Value

ICollection<Feed>

FullPath

Full hierarchical path from root to this category (e.g., "News/Sports/Local"). Computed on demand — useful for display and breadcrumbs.

[NotMapped]
public string FullPath { get; }

Property Value

string

Id

Internal auto-increment primary key.

[Key]
[DatabaseGenerated(DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity)]
public int Id { get; set; }

Property Value

int

IsExpanded

Indicates whether this category is expanded in the UI tree view. Transient state — not persisted in database.

[NotMapped]
public bool IsExpanded { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

IsRoot

Indicates whether this is a root-level category (no parent).

[NotMapped]
public bool IsRoot { get; }

Property Value

Timestamp of the last modification (name, description, sort order, etc.).

public DateTime? LastModified { get; set; }

Property Value

DateTime?

Name

Display name of the category. Unique within the same parent to prevent naming conflicts.

[Required]
[MaxLength(200)]
public string Name { get; set; }

Property Value

string

ParentCategory

Navigation property to the parent category (null for root-level categories).

[ForeignKey("ParentCategoryId")]
public virtual Category? ParentCategory { get; set; }

Property Value

Category

ParentCategoryId

Foreign key to the parent category (null for root categories).

public int? ParentCategoryId { get; set; }

Property Value

int?

SortOrder

Custom sort order within the parent category (ascending). Lower values appear first in lists and trees.

public int SortOrder { get; set; }

Property Value

int

Subcategories

Collection of child categories (subfolders).

[InverseProperty("ParentCategory")]
public virtual ICollection<Category> Subcategories { get; set; }
